entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
